instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00281 20v 0.03amps
threads.message:
Board looks like its been thru a few shops, GPU seems to have some heard near by.

Found short on PP3V3_S0, both U9850 and U9800 were shorted, I replaced those and short is gone, but not the board is stuck at 20v 0.03amps
I checked all rails on page 120 and 121 (that's how I found the above short) now there are not shorts but no power, PP3V3_S0 is obviously 0v.

Any pointers are appreciated, reballing that U9800 took some time.

threads.title: 820-00281 20v 0.03amps
threads.message:
If board was messed up like that, could be just waste of time.

Did you check basic voltages and signals for power on sequence?
Do you get 3V3_S5/SUS?
What about PM_RSMRST_L, PM_PWRBTN_L and RTC?

threads.title: 820-00281 20v 0.03amps
threads.message:
[LEFT]PP[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]3V3_S5 3.3v
PP3V3_SUS 3.3v
PM_RSMRST_L 3.3v
PM_PWRBTN_L 3.3v

Taking a closer look it seems like some work was done on U1100 I think that is the PCH, or the previews shot that worked on it removed it for some reason and this may not even be the correct one.

Please advice.[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]

threads.title: 820-00281 20v 0.03amps
threads.message:
I don't think is a good idea to continue.

However, you can check RTC signals.
Also trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and check for drop pulse at PM_PWRBTN_L.
If present, check for pulse at PM_SLP_Sx_L signals.

threads.title: 820-00281 20v 0.03amps
threads.message:
When I trigger [LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]SMC_ONOFF_L[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
  [LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]PM_PWRBTN_L does NOT pulse

I think this will be a good board... for parts LoL[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]

threads.title: 820-00281 20v 0.03amps
threads.message:
Apart of PCH, looks like SMC problem too.
So good board for scrap...
